definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: He gave the steering-wheel to Mr.
sentences.chinese: 他把方向盤給了摩赫南先生。

sentences.english: Inom not used to driving cars with their steering wheels inside the right.
sentences.chinese: 我不民風於駕駛方向盤在左邊的汽車。

sentences.english: It uses a 7-speed sequential-manual gearbox with paddle shifters on the steering wheel .
sentences.chinese: 它採用了7速順序手動變速箱的換檔方向盤上。

sentences.english: My knuckles whitened from my tense grip on the steering wheel.
sentences.chinese: 我的指關節從我在方向盤的緊張的夾子漂白了。

sentences.english: I swerved to avoid them and hit a fence.
sentences.chinese: 我打方向盤躲開他們，結果撞上了護欄。

sentences.english: He sashayed his car with one hand on the steering wheel.
sentences.chinese: 他一隻手扶着方向盤瀟灑地開着車。

sentences.english: Tired of spinning that steering wheel?
On steering wheel, on gauge board, but also moistens has boy's bloodstain.
sentences.chinese: 在方向盤上，在測量儀板，沾有男孩的血跡。

sentences.english: She turned the steering-wheel sharply to the left to avoid a cyclist.
sentences.chinese: 她猛然向左轉動方向盤避開壹個騎車的人。

sentences.english: If this works out weel have many pages i need to generate fans for.
sentences.chinese: 如果這一點方向盤的作品我很多網頁需要生成球迷。

sentences.english: The choices we make form the rudder that directs our marriage journey.
sentences.chinese: 我們所做的選擇成爲了我們的婚姻旅程的方向盤。

sentences.english: Other screen is the rev counter which is fixed on the steering wheel.
sentences.chinese: 另一個顯示屏是速度表，安裝在方向盤上。

sentences.english: He squeezed the steering wheel until his knuckles turned ash- gray.
sentences.chinese: 他的手狠狠地攥着方向盤，指節都變成了灰白色。

sentences.english: I immediately applied the brakes and turned the steering wheel quickly to the right.
sentences.chinese: 我立即剎車，並迅速把方向盤轉往右邊。

sentences.english: Place the front wheels in the straight-ahead position.
sentences.chinese: 將方向盤定位，使前車輪朝向正前方。

definition: to brake (when driving)/to stop/to switch off/to check (bad habits)/a brake
car door/door of bus, railway carriage etc
button or key (on a device)/keystroke/CL:個|个[ge4]/to press a button
to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
